attributes.action: Give self - employed couriers who after expenses earn less than the minimun wage a top - up to bring it to mimimum wage level .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am employed on a self-employed basis by a National home shopping delivery company yet I get paid only for each parcel I deliver and no expenses whatsoever and on some days actually lose money .
I would also like to see people in my employment situation get equal rights as if they were employed of which I feel I am but in the eyes of my ' employer ' I am not !
